text: Christine McPeters Auten (born May 7, 1969 in Huntsville, Alabama) is an American voice actress, ADR director, and ADR scriptwriter who works for Funimation, ADV Films and Sentai Filmworks. She is currently a producer for SXSW Interactive. Auten performs the voice of Esdeath, the main antagonist from the popular anime Akame ga Kill, Mesousa from Pani Poni Dash, Kurenai from Samurai Gun, Yufan Xia from Full Metal Panic: The Second Raid, Priscilla Asagiri from Bubblegum Crisis Tokyo 2040, and Sakaki from Azumanga Daioh. ==Personal life== As of 2017, she lives in Austin, Texas with her husband Andrew Auten. ==Filmography== Anime {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" !Year !Title !Role ! class="unsortable" |Notes ! class="unsortable" |Source |- |2007 |Air Gear |Rika Noyamano | | |- |2015 |Akame ga Kill |Esdeath | | |- |2004 |Azumanga Daioh |Sakaki | | |- |1999 |Bubblegum Crisis Tokyo 2040 |Priscilla Asagiri | | |- |2008 |Claymore |Teresa | | |- |2010 |Eden of the East |Kuroha "Diana" Shiratori | | |- |2004 |Fullmetal Alchemist |Izumi Curtis |also Brotherhood |"Beasts of Dublith".
